meanings.definition: A bag used to carry books and other supplies to and from school.
meanings.sent1: My schoolbag is heavy with all my books and pencils.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, I grab my schoolbag before heading to class.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally packed my lunch in my schoolbag with my textbooks!
meanings.sent4: Her schoolbag was a treasure trove of knowledge and adventure.
meanings.sent5: The bright red schoolbag stood out in the sea of students.

meanings.definition: To pack or organize items in a schoolbag.
meanings.sent1: I need to schoolbag my notebooks neatly for tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She carefully schoolbags her art supplies before art class.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to schoolbag your gym clothes for after-school practice!
meanings.sent4: He schoolbags his thoughts and ideas in his schoolbag of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The teacher showed us how to schoolbag our assignments for easy access.
